rooms.name: Mud Room / Foyer
rooms.description: Entrance hall with open design leading to living areas and garden view.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with seating arrangements near the large window opening to the garden. Vastu alignment ensures energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to living room for easy serving; large window for natural light.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Private space with an en-suite bathroom. Placed in a Vastu-optimized zone for relaxation.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, inviting door complemented by natural light entering from garden side.

openings.name: Garden Window
openings.description: Expansive window connecting the living area to the garden; enhances ventilation and Vastu alignment.
